<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">

        <description>associatedmarket.index(bulk) > -1</description>
        <name>checkLogdetails</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var checkLogdetails = Class.create();
checkLogdetails.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    /*logAttributes: function(trdData) {//wortking code

        var missingAttr = [];
        var responseData = new JSON.parse(trdData);
        var count = Object.keys(responseData); //extract keys from the payload
        for (var i = 0; i < count.length; i++) {
            if (responseData[count[i]] == '') {
                missingAttr.push(count[i]); // Attributes with empty values
            }
        }
        if (missingAttr.length > 0) {
            return missingAttr;
        }
    },*/ //working code

    logAttributest: function(trdData) { //wortking code

        var missingAttr = [];
        var responseData = new global.JSON.parse(trdData);
        var count = Object.keys(responseData); //extract keys from the payload
        for (var i = 0; i < count.length; i++) {
            if (responseData[count[i]] == '') {
                missingAttr.push(count[i]); // Attributes with empty values
            }
        }
        if (missingAttr.length > 0) {
            return missingAttr;
        }
    },
    

    type: 'checkLogdetails'
};]]></script>
